name: Eric Ryan
description: I am easygoing,friendly and never worry.I have a strong character and will take charge of your life.I have a good sense of humour and like to laugh at life.ANY MAN CAN LOVE A MILLION WOMEN BUT ONLY A REAL MAN CAN LOVE ONE WOMAN A MILLION WAYS….I AM NOT LOOKING FOR A PERFECT WOMAN.I AM LOOKING FOR A WOMAN TO LOVE PERFECTLY….I AM LOOKING FOR A FRIEND,A WIFE AND A LOVER ALL IN ONE.
